artist: Painter: After Frans van Mieris the Elder; Engraver: Carl Gottlieb Guttenberg
description: Interior with a chemist seated near a window; apprentice holding bellows; geometric frame around outer edge of sheet
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black:Peint par F.V. Mieris   Grave par Carl Guttenberg / LE CHIMISTE / De la Galerie de S.A.S. Monseigneur le Duc d\' Orléans / A.P.D.R. / ECOLE HOLLANDOISE. | on sheet in pencil: 2-67
title: The Chemist
